import typography from"assets/theme/base/typography";import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";// Argon Dashboard 2 MUI helper functions
import pxToRem from"assets/theme/functions/pxToRem";const{size,fontWeightRegular}=typography;const{grey,dark,secondary}=colors;const stepLabel={styleOverrides:{label:{marginTop:`${pxToRem(8)} !important`,fontWeight:fontWeightRegular,fontSize:size.md,color:grey[300],"&.Mui-active":{fontWeight:`${fontWeightRegular} !important`,color:`${dark.main} !important`},"&.Mui-completed":{fontWeight:`${fontWeightRegular} !important`,color:`${secondary.main} !important`}}}};export default stepLabel;
